If you don't mind a bigger download, the best quality PDFs (and a couple of other formats) are at
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7043343/J.K._Rowling_-_Complete_Works_v3_-_PDF-LIT-RTF_Reference_Quality

They're basically replicas of the standard US books and the adult UK books.  See the screenshot.  The quality is so good that you would swear they were official PDFs from the publisher.  No exaggeration.
